comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: This photo is the copy of a postcard. See www.dhm.de/datenbank/dhm.php?user=uml&seite=5&fld... The text erased on the Bain picture says: Original-Aufnahme vom Kriegsschauplatz. Am Grabe gefallener Kameraden auf einem Schlachtfelde. (Original exposure of a site of war. At the grave of killed comrades on a battlefield) The inscription on the cross: Hier ruhen in Gott mehrere tapfere deutsche Krieger gewidmet von Res. San. Komp. 9 (Here rest in god several brave german warriors, devoted ...)

comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: The horses are wearing the collars and traces of artillery horses.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: B-59:  Thank you for finding the matching postcard. We will add the original caption to the image description when we update.
